'''Ceiling Lamp''' is a [[Furnishing Subcategory]] in the category [[Decoration]].

Many rooms within the realm's [[Mansion]] must have a Ceiling Lamp. The [[Load]] of the Ceiling Lamp is counted towards the overall load limit of the room.
